attributes.long-description:
Save more than 40% with this special holiday bundle, which includes three award-winning games. The artist-friendly UbiArt Framework game engine allows artists to easily develop games using their living concept art. Each of these games was built with UbiArt engine and is known for its unique hand-drawn art style, creating a new world of fantasy as these art pieces come to life.
Rayman Legends – Unlock five uniquely themed worlds of colorful visuals and amusing music while battling grotesque and nutty creatures.
Rayman Origins – Fight loony characters and experience humorous gameplay, visuals, and sounds in this critically acclaimed game.
Child of Light – Battle the forces of darkness in search of the sun, moon, and stars. Find your way home while exploring a world of oil-painted canvas.


1-2 player(s)
Ad Hoc Mode 2 Players
Network Players - 2
Network Features
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad
Motion Sensor

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.

attributes.name: UbiArt Game Bundle
